title.text: RFC 7803: Changing the Registration Policy for the NETCONF Capability URNs Registry

contents.text:
Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                          B. Leiba
Request for Comments: 7803                           Huawei Technologies
BCP: 203                                                   February 2016
Updates: 6241
Category: Best Current Practice
ISSN: 2070-1721
Changing the Registration Policy for the NETCONF Capability URNs Registry
contents.zh-CHS: 更改NETCONF功能URNs注册表的注册策略

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: The registration policy for the "Network Configuration Protocol (NETCONF) Capability URNs" registry, set up by RFC 6241, has turned out to be unnecessarily strict. This document changes that registration policy to "IETF Review", allowing registrations from certain well-reviewed Experimental RFCs, in addition to Standards Track RFCs.
contents.zh-CHS: 由RFC 6241设置的“网络配置协议（NETCONF）功能URNs”注册表的注册策略被证明是不必要的严格。本文件将该注册政策更改为“IETF审查”，除了标准跟踪RFC外，还允许从某些经过充分审查的实验RFC进行注册。

1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: The "Network Configuration Protocol (NETCONF) Capability URNs" registry [RFC6241] was set up with a registration policy of "Standards Action" [RFC5226], allowing registrations only from Standards Track RFCs. This provided thorough review of the specifications that are requesting NETCONF Capability URNs. It has turned out to be desirable to allocate capability URNs for certain Experimental RFCs also, provided those specifications are also carefully reviewed. The existing registration policy is, therefore, unnecessarily strict, requiring exception handling by the IESG. This document changes that registration policy to "IETF Review", which also allows registrations from certain well-reviewed Experimental RFCs, or, for example, corrections to registry errors from Informational RFCs, with IETF review and consensus.
contents.zh-CHS: “网络配置协议（NETCONF）功能URNs”注册表[RFC6241]是使用“标准操作”[RFC5226]的注册策略设置的，只允许从标准跟踪RFC进行注册。这提供了对请求NETCONF功能URN的规范的全面审查。事实证明，为某些实验性RFC分配能力URN也是可取的，前提是这些规范也经过仔细审查。因此，现行的注册政策过于严格，需要IESG进行例外处理。本文件将该注册政策更改为“IETF审查”，这也允许从某些经过充分审查的实验RFC注册，或者，例如，通过IETF审查和协商一致，纠正信息RFC的注册错误。

contents.text: 2. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 2. IANA考虑

contents.text: IANA has changed the registration policy for the "Network Configuration Protocol (NETCONF) Capability URNs" registry to "IETF Review" and has added this document to the registry's reference field.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已将“网络配置协议（NETCONF）能力URNs”注册表的注册策略更改为“IETF审查”，并已将此文档添加到注册表的参考字段中。

contents.text: Registrations made from RFCs that are not on the Standards Track need to be carefully reviewed through IETF Last Call and in consultation with relevant working groups, such as NETCONF. The Operations and Management Area Directors should confirm that the document has received the appropriate level of review during IESG Evaluation.
contents.zh-CHS: 不在标准轨道上的RFC注册需要通过IETF Last Call并与相关工作组（如NETCONF）协商仔细审查。运营和管理区域主管应确认，在IESG评估期间，文件已收到适当级别的审查。

contents.text: 3. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 安全考虑

contents.text: This document is purely procedural, and there are no related security considerations.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件纯粹是程序性的，没有相关的安全考虑。
